name: Dungeon Buddies
description:
Dungeon Buddies is a turn-based strategy game. Defeat all the enemies without losing any allies to complete each level. Finish all three levels to win!

Made in one week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme "Stronger Together."

Attribution:

Music: Track 2 from Abstraction's Ludum Dare 38 loops.  http://abstractionmusic.com/

Font:

Arcade Classic by pizzadude. http://pizzadude.dk/site/
